title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...

snippet: The ministers of Cambusnethan and Stranraer were deposed from the sacred office.

title: Traditions of Edinburgh.
author: Chambers, Robert
snippet: Lord Somerville and his kinsman, Somerville of Cambusnethan, had long carried on a litigation.

title: Scotland, its faith and its features; or, a Visit to Blair Athol
author: Trench, Francis.
snippet: In the Cambusnethan, Stranraer and FourthLethendy Cases, the Court of Session interdictedthe General Assembly, and inferior ChurchCourts, from inflicting Church censures, andproceeding in trials involving charges of immorality against respective ministers.
